about_the_game:
One Shot Arena is a fast-paced multiplayer arena where precision and agility are the keys to victory. Every hero can be taken down with a single hit, making each move critical. However, the game isn't just about avoiding danger; it's about mastering a wide range of abilities to dodge, deceive, and outsmart your opponents. Engage in intense battles where every move counts, and only the most skilled players will emerge as winners.

Key Features


• Diverse Abilities
Each hero has unique abilities and their own learning curve. Master your favorite heroes to gain an advantage on the battlefield.
Learn the strenghts and weaknesses of each hero to leverage your chances.

• Multiplayer Fights
Battle against friends and foes in dynamic arenas. Available in 1v1, 2v2 and Free For All formats.
You can play each mode in ranked or unranked.

• Skill-Based Gameplay
Collect victories and improve your rating to climb the leaderboards.

• Instant Eliminations
Every hit counts. Reflexes and strategic thinking are crucial to defeat your enemies and win rounds.



Dive into One Shot Arena and experience the thrill of high-speed combat where every move matters. Can you outlast and outplay your rivals? The arena awaits your legend to be written.

name: One Shot Arena

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: intel Core i7 4770
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: One Shot Arena is a multiplayer game of precision and perfect timing, where quick reflexes and sharp strategy make all the difference. Are you ready to outsmart and outplay your rivals?
